com.aurel.track.admin.customize.category.report.execute

Class ReportBeansToLaTeXConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aurel.track.admin.customize.category.report.execute.ReportBeansToLaTeXConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.xmlmind.util.Console

    public class ReportBeansToLaTeXConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.xmlmind.util.Console
    ReportBeansToLaTeXConverter provides the methods to generate a PDF document based on a LaTeX template from a set of report beans. This class can thus generate nicely formatted PDF documents from Wiki documents.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.xmlmind.util.Console

        com.xmlmind.util.Console.MessageType

      • fillFreemarkerContext

        protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> fillFreemarkerContext(TWorkItemBean workItem,
                                                                     java.util.List<ReportBean> items,
                                                                     TPersonBean user,
                                                                     java.util.Locale locale,
                                                                     java.lang.StringBuilder inlineMacroBuffer)
        Create a map containing all objects for the Freemarker context. This resolves inline linked items as well. All rich text in this map has been converted to LaTeX format. The map is being used by the Freemarker processor to generate a complete LaTeX document, which then is processed by the LaTeX processor.
        Parameters:
        items -
        parser -
        Returns:

      • streamPdf

        public static void streamPdf(java.io.OutputStream os,
             java.io.File pdfFile)
        Write the LateX generated PDF into the output stream. In case the file could not be generated, write the debug info file.
        Parameters:
        os - the output stream to write the file to
        pdfFile - the PDF file to write to the output stream
